body.name: Vimukun Single Serve Coffee Maker, Coffee Maker One Cup Compatible with K-Cup Pods & Ground Coffee, Single Cup Coffee Machine with 6 to 14oz Reservoir, Auto Shut-off, Small Size(Green)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 19 mins

features: 2 Ways for Brewing Coffee: The single serve coffee maker makes it compatible with ground coffee and K-cup pods. You can choose your favorite coffee style and brewing you exclusive style coffee. This coffee brewer suit for k-cup coffee and ground coffee in one.

One Click for All Your Needs: The one cup coffee maker is easy to use, fill water in the reservoir of the coffee machine, add a cup or pour grounds in the mesh filter, then press the button and wait for about 2 minutes to enjoy your coffee. As well as cleaning easily with that, too. No need to worry if you forget to shut off the coffee brewer, the machine will turn off automatically.
Portable Tiny: This single cup coffee maker takes a little bit to make one cup of coffee in a machine that's the size of a desk lamp. Compact size doesn't overwhelm your counter.

Choose Your Coffee Strength and Cup Size: It is convenient to customize your own style coffee. The water reservoir has a capacity of 6-14 OZ and allows you to control how much coffee you want to brew the grounds coffee. It also compatible for the coffee mug from 4.3" to 4.7".

Best Solution for Travel or Business: With the most compact design and durable construction, this compact coffee machine is perfect for home, office, dorm room, apartment, caravan, traveling, etc. Just enjoy your coffee everywhere.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VIMUKUN Single Serve Coffee Maker 2 Ways for Brewing Coffee The Single Serve Coffee Maker comes with a capsule basket and reusable capsule.You can choose to add the coffee ground to the basket or use the capsule for K-cup, add the right amount of water, and press the corresponding button to make a savoury coffee. One-button for All Your Needs Just add water to tank then press the buttons, you can set your hands for free and let the coffee machine clean itself. When there is not enough water in the water tank, the coffee machine will automatically shuts off.

Quick Brew Technology No more long waiting for the brew, 10 seconds to heat up, only 90 seconds to brew a 6oz cup and 3 minutes to a 14oz cup of coffee (maximum capacity). The quick brewing technology allows you to save time and enjoy a cup of hot coffee in every moment. Compact and Easy to carry The compact, space-saving design fits in any space, including offices, RVs, and camping, allowing you to take this small coffee maker with you wherever you go.
Previous page Next page 1 For K-Cup 2 For Coffee Grounds 3 For Tea

How much coffee powder should be added each time, and what type of grind is required? Please do not exceed the MAX line. The coffee maker is recommended to use medium coarse ground coffee(smaller than NO.5). It is not recommended to use espresso grounds. Does this single cup coffee maker have auto shut-off? Yes, it turns off automatically after 3 minutes of inactivity, and you can also turn off the machine at any time with the push of a button. It is especially safe to use. How much water should I add to brew the best tasting coffee with this single serve coffee maker? It is recommended to add no more than 10 ounces of water when brewing coffee, so that the coffee will not come out too bland. If you want a lighter coffee, you can increase the amount of water, but not more than 14 ounces at most. What's in the package? 1x Coffee Maker, 1x Capsule Basket, 1x Reusable Filter, 1x Removable Cup Mat, 1x Instruction Manual Why can't the top lid be closed after attaching the basket filter or pod holder? The basket should be aligned and placed according to the letters "Front" of the overbasket or the top will not close properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: This single serve coffee maker is great! Love the color of it and it works great! I really liked that it did come with a basket you can insert with your own coffee so you don’t have to use the K-cups if you don’t have them. The cord isn’t very long but that is fine as we just use it on the kitchen counter by an outlet. It suggests you run water through first to make sure clean. Very quick and you have coffee fast! Great little machine!
